content: **welcome to the unhinged christmas blanket cal ** i decided very last minute to put together an interlocking crochet christmas blanket full of the kind of holiday cheer your conservative christian parents definitely won t approve of **content warning ** this cal will include adult humor irreverent themes profanity sexual innuendo and rated-r holiday nonsense *if you want a wholesome hallmark-movie blanket this is not that if you want to laugh this is absolutely that * using a 5 mm hook and worsted weight yarn the final blanket will be approximately 5 ft by 5 ft **this listing is for the december 3 2025 square ** all i want for christmas is impeachment *the square titled snow is coming 1 will also be a bonus square released today only available with the cal purchase* this square is available for free on my website but you may also purchase it here as a standalone pattern or as part of the full cal new squares release daily between december 1 25 before 5 pm cst ****bundle discounts ** this pattern is eligible for automatic percentage-off savings with the purchase of other squares from the **2025 unhinged christmas cal ** buy 2 squares → 10% off buy 3 squares → 20% off buy 5 squares → 30% off discounts apply automatically at checkout when you purchase multiple **unhinged christmas squares ** *if you re buying several it will be more cost-effective to purchase the full cal for $15 which includes all 30 designs * ** **if you purchase the complete cal ** optional joining instructions will be added on december 25 possible bonus squares may appear because i cannot be stopped *if you have a sense of humor or want to piss off your relatives you re in the right place * 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/snow-is-coming-3
